entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Leamington
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:37 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.3°C
entry.summary:

Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 78 %
Dewpoint: 1.7°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain mixed with snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain mixed with snow at times heavy beginning near noon. Rainfall amount 15 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Snow or rain. Local blowing snow. Windy. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
